actions.description: The hydroloth makes two Bite or Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) force damage plus 9 (2d10) psychic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) force damage plus 9 (2d10) psychic damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes 14 (4d6) psychic damage, and it must make a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target loses all proficiencies; it can't cast spells; it can't understand language; and if its Intelligence and Charisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A greater restoration or remove curse spell cast on the target ends this effect early.
actions.name: Steal Memory (1/Day)

actions.description: The hydroloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
actions.name: Teleport

actions.description:
The hydroloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only)

3/day each: control water, crown of madness, fear, suggestion
actions.name: Spellcasting

name: Hydroloth [MoM]
resistances: cold, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious

specialTraits.description: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx, as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.
specialTraits.name: Secure Memory

specialTraits.description: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.
specialTraits.name: Watery Advantage
